programme.title: Rastros de um Crime, (2021, Action)

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe!
programme.desc: Kakashi hospitalizado devido tenso causada por seu mangekyo sharinga. Apesar dos apelos de Shizune para enviar outra equipe, Tsunade afirma que enviar a equipe Kakashi para fazer o trabalho.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis
programme.desc: Sai diz que ele e Naruto se encontraro de novo e desaparece. Homura e Koharu dizem a Tsunade que Naruto no deve ser enviado em misses envolvendo a Akatsuki. Tsunade no concorda, ento eles exigem que ela adicione um ninja recomendado por Danzo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido
programme.desc: A nova equipe Kakashi segue em direo ponte Tenchi. Quando Sai mostra seu desprezo por Sasuke, o antagonismo com Naruto aumenta. Yamato decide que eles passaro a noite em uma pousada para tentar melhorar as relaes entre os membros de sua equipe.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden
programme.desc: Yamato faz uma simulao para avaliar as habilidades e tcnicas de luta da equipe Kakashi. Sai abandona Naruto para concluir a misso simulada. Naruto fica uma fera e declara que, se para ajudar a salvar o Sasuke, ele ficar na mesma equipe que Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar
programme.desc: O dia para capturar o espio finalmente chega. Yamato assume a aparncia de Sasori e espera que o espio aparea. Para a surpresa de todos, o espio era Kabuto. De repente, Orochimaru aparece. A situao muda, e a equipe Kakashi se encontra em risco.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero
programme.desc: Ao enfrentar Orochimaru, Naruto liberta o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Quando Yamato v a quarta cauda, lembra do que Jiraiya falou. Yamato deveria suprimir o chakra que afetaria o corpo de Naruto. O ninjutsu secreto de Yamato se torna aparente.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge
programme.desc: Naruto fica chocado ao saber que foi o responsvel pelos ferimentos de Sakura. Yamato diz que ele ir suprimir o poder da Raposa de Nove Caudas com seu ninjutsu. Sakura pergunta sobre uma histria estranha que ela viu no livro de desenhos de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo
programme.desc: Sai estremece quando encontra Sasuke no esconderijo de Orochimaru. Sai ficar com Orochimaru em troca de algumas informaes valiosas, mas ficar sob priso domiciliar at que possa ser de confiana. Quando fica sozinho, sai e comea a procurar um livro.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Escalada De Prata
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi consegue achar Sai. Eles comeam a interrog-lo sobre os planos de Danzo, e Sai conta tudo. Sakura descobre, atravs das atitudes de Sai, alguns pontos fortes em seu subconsciente e assinala para Sai as contradies em seu comportamento.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Julgamento
programme.desc: Kabuto faz um ataque de surpresa na equipe Kakashi para levar Sai de volta. Com as informaes que conseguem atravs de Kabuto, capturado, a procura por Sasuke est perto do fim. Naruto e Sakura correm para achar Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Un Grito Interrompido
programme.desc: Naruto procura por Sasuke. Sai lembra que teve um irmo mais velho e consegue terminar o retrato inacabado. Antes de desaparecer aps um ataque de Orochimaru, Sai promete que salvar Sasuke. Yamato descobre uma verdade entre os pertences de Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi fica chocada ao saber que a misso verdadeira de Sai matar Sasuke. Sai alcana Sasuke - deve mat-lo ou salv-lo? Sai e Sasuke se enfrentam, demolindo uma parte do esconderijo. Naruto e os outros encontram Sasuke.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Notcias Tristes
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi tem seu desejo atendido ao reencontrar Sasuke, mas Sasuke no mudou. Seu objetivo se vingar de seu irmo mais velho, Itachi. Os impulsos da Raposa de Nove Caudas incitam Naruto, mas Sasuke usa seu sharingan para suprimir a raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Dez
programme.desc: O desejo de Sasuke por vingana continua firme. Naruto fica chateado quando percebe que fracassou mais uma vez em levar Sasuke para casa. Orochimaru tem mais ou menos seis meses at sua transferncia. A equipe Kakashi faz uma nova promessa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Alvo Na Mira!
programme.desc: Kakashi e a equipe dez partem para deter o akatsuki. Tsunade considera a equipe dez de naruto com o respaldo ideal para a equipe dez e manda naruto aperfeioar seu novo jutsu em 24 horas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades De Kakuzu
programme.desc: Shikamaru e choji do os primeiros golpes na batalha, mas esto contrariados com o poder de kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terrvel Segredo
programme.desc: Shikamaru e seus companheiros desesperadamente contra-atacam a ofensiva do jutsu de fogo. Mas usar continuamente rasengan e a espada relmpago causa desgaste em kakashi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Gnio Shikamaru
programme.desc: Shikamaru enfrenta hidan sozinho, no fundo da floresta e aps gastar todo seu chakra, ele tem um ferimento profundo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!
programme.desc: Naruto e a equipe kakashi chegam na hora certa para ajudar a equipe asuma. Sakura e sai receberam ordens de kakashi para ajudar shikamaru, que est lutando sozinho
programme.sub-title: Quando Se Amaldioa Algum, Cava-Se O Prprio Tmulo!

programme.desc: Ino e choji ficam pasmos com novo jutsu de naruto, e kakuzu sente o perigo se aproximando. Mas ao lan-lo, o novo jutsu se dissipa antes de atingir kakuzu.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Preo Do Poder
programme.desc: Naruto usa seu novo jutsu para derrotar kakuzu. Tsunade d boas-vindas na volta das equipes ao lar e manda que as equipes asuma e yamato faam uma pausa

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Determinao Do Shinobi
programme.desc: Justo quando a paz finalmente chega aldeia, surge uma informao de que o esconderijo de orochimaru foi encontrado

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Esconderijo Do Orochimaru Descoberto!
programme.desc: Naruto e jiraiya chegam s fontes termais. Como uma alternativa ao estilo vento: rasen shuriken, jiraiya sugere a naruto a colaborao de um ninjutsu com um sapo ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Encontro
programme.desc: No esconderijo de orochimaru guren testemunha sasuke derrotando mil oponentes. Tendo perdido a oportunidade para ser nova hospedeira de orochimaru no passado, guren abertamente expressa seu cime em relao a sasuke

programme.desc: Separado de Boruto e Sarada, Konohamaru enfrenta Victor. Mas uma pessoa inesperada aparece para lutar ao lado dele.

programme.desc: O dirigvel transportando o Receptculo da Kara desaparece, e os Internos convocam uma reunio de emergncia.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto Uzumaki, filho do lder da aldeia, salva um garoto chamado Denki Kaminarimon, que est sendo incomodado por valentes.

programme.desc: Depois de ser suspenso pela baguna na cerimnia de entrada, Boruto vai para a academia pela primeira vez.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Depois de se envolver na briga entre Metal e Shikadai, Boruto percebe que Metal est com o chakra estranho, assim como o de Denki.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Um Jutsu Visual coloca Boruto dentro de um sonho. Depois disso, Boruto passa a afirmar que o sonho fez despertar seu Byakugan, o Kekkei Genkai do cl Hyuga, de sua me.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Sob a superviso de seu pai e seu av, Boruto treina com sua tia Hanabi. Ele se esfora muito, mas no consegue ativar o Byakugan de jeito nenhum.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto apelida a sombra misteriosa de "O Fantasma" e fica animado quando seus amigos, Shikadai e Mitsuki, se juntam a ele para resolver os recentes "Incidentes de Fantasmas".

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Em trabalho escolar sobre profisses, Sumire, Wasabi Izuno e Namida Suzumeno acabam se envolvendo em um Incidente de Fantasma e se machucam.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations

programme.desc: Worlds collide when Enn, a shy teenager in 70s London, meets the beautiful and rebellious Zan (Elle Fanning) at a party. They set in motion the ultimate showdown between their rivaling worlds and test the limits of how far they will go for true love.

programme.title: Locke, (2014, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: A man's (Tom Hardy) life unravels after he leaves a construction site at a critical time and drives to London to be present for the birth of a child conceived during a one-night stand.

programme.title: mid90s, (2018, Dramedy)
programme.desc: From director Jonah Hill, mid90s is a funny, moving look at Stevie, a kid in '90s LA, as he escapes his turbulent home life with a new group of friends he meets at a local skate shop, plunging him into a world of fun, danger, and excitement.

programme.title: Minari, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: A tender and sweeping story about what roots us, Minari follows a Korean-American family that moves to an Arkansas farm in search of their own American Dream.

programme.title: A Most Violent Year, (2014, Crime)
programme.desc: In 1981 NYC, an immigrant (Oscar Isaac) and his family try to expand their business as rampant violence and corruption drag them in and threaten to destroy all they have built.

programme.title: Obvious Child, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: A one night stand leaves a woman (Jenny Slate) with an unexpected surprise just in time for Valentine's Day in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy that has critics audiences raving.

programme.title: The Spectacular Now, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Effortless charmer Sutter Keely (Miles Teller) unexpectedly falls for "good girl" Aimee Finnicky (Shailene Woodley) in this authentic and charming portrait about the perilous business of young love and growing up.

programme.title: Blankman, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: In Living Color's favorite team of Damon Wayans and David Alan Grier joins Robin Givens, Jon Polito and Jason Alexander in this hilarious crime-fighting comedy about two slapstick heroes who triumph over evil... more or less. Rated PG-13

programme.title: Girl, Interrupted, (1999, Biographical Drama)
programme.desc: Winona Ryder and Academy Award(r)-winner Angelina Jolie are the certifiable stars of Claymoore Hospital's South Bell ward in this wry adaptation of Susanna Kaysen's best-selling memoir.

programme.title: Philadelphia, (1993, Courtroom Drama)
programme.desc: Hailed as a landmark film that dazzles with deep emotion and exceptional acting, PHILADELPHIA stars Tom Hanks and Denzel Washington as two competing lawyers who join forces to sue a prestigious law firm for AIDS discrimination. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: The Remains of the Day, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Oscar-winners Anthony Hopkins (The Silence of the Lambs) and Emma Thompson (Howards End) reunite with the acclaimed Merchant Ivory filmmaking team for this extraordinary and moving story of blind devotion and repressed love. Rated PG

programme.title: Blue Chips, (1994, Drama)
programme.desc: Pete Bell, a college basketball coach is under a lot of pressure. His team isn't winning. The stars of the future are being paid by other teams. This practise is forbidden in the college game, but Pete is desperate and has pressures from all around.

programme.title: Major League II, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: Minor league pitcher Gus Cantrell is given the opportunity to manage the South Carolina Buzz. The ailing baseball team is full of a wacky lineup of terrible players, but owner Roger Dorn is banking on Cantrell to make a top-notch franchise out of them.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Death Wish, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: In this explosive story of revenge and urban violence, Charles Bronson plays Paul Kersey, a bleeding-heart liberal who has a change of opinion after his wife and daughter are violently attacked by a gang of thugs in their apartment.

programme.title: Serpico, (1973, Thriller)
programme.desc: A true-life drama of a cop whose revelations about the extent of bribery in the New York Police Department almost led to his death and resulted in the creation of the Knapp Commission.

programme.title: Foxy Brown, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: A blaxploitation film about a woman whose drug-dealing brother ratted on her undercover narcotics-agent boyfriend to the mob and she, in turn, poses as a call girl to infiltrate the mobsters who butchered him.

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood and Jeff Bridges lead a strong supporting cast in this offbeat crime caper about a colorful group of bank robbers determined to break into the fortress-like Montana Armored Depository.

programme.title: Bobbie Jo And The Outlaw, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: A stunning carhop who wants to be a country singer and her sweetheart who dreams he's Billy the Kid become involved in robbery and murder.

programme.title: Rockers, (1978, Documentary)
programme.desc: Night Flight Presents: Starring Leroy 'Horsemouth' Wallace and Richard 'Dirty Harry' Hall; ROCKERS is a story of oppressed Jamaican musicians getting even with the 'mafia types' in the business

programme.title: The Harder They Come, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: Reggae legend Jimmy Cliff stars as Ivan Martin, an aspiring singer hoping to make a name for himself. Robbed of his money and possessions, he finds work with a self-righteous preacher

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has found a counter to Pegasus's mind-reading ability: Yugi switches back and forth between his two souls! Yugi is able to destroy Pegasus's Toon World, but the duel has just only begun. The next level of the deadly Shadow Game is about to start!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi crumples under the power of the Shadow Game. His friends yell desperate encouragement, but their voices cannot penetrate the sphere of darkness. Yugi's chance at victory is slipping away, as is his life!
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 4

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus summons Relinquished, a fearsome monster that can consume Yugi's Duel Monsters! Yugi counters with Kuriboh?
programme.sub-title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium, Part 5

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: The story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed, and the Yeti Cool Brothers set their sights on a showdown with the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Annihilate the Straw Hats! Legendary Assassins Descend!

programme.title: Luffy tries to chase down the Yetti Cool Brothers, but Franky still trapped in Chopper's Body makes his mission extremely difficult. Just when all appears lost, an unexpected ally lends a hand!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Nami! Luffy's Fight on the Snow-Capped Mountains!

programme.title: Luffy agrees to an alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master unleashes something very deadly!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Formed! Luffy and Law's Pirate Alliance!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, Trafalgar tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory, and Luffy boldly challenges the Master!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Capture M! The Pirate Alliance's Operation Launches!

programme.title: Luffy's battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob and the evil genius who created the monster!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: On the Verge of Annihilation! A Deadly Monster Comes Flying In!

programme.title: The Straw Hats make a valiant push to capture Caesar Clown - Luffy matches his Armament Haki with Clown's powerful Gas-Gas Fruit powers! The battle turns in favor of the Straw Hats, but underestimating Clown's abilities may have deadly consequences!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Intense Battle! Caesar Exercises His True Power!

programme.title: Trafalgar Law finds trouble in the form of an old acquaintance, Chopper investigates the Master's lab, and the mysterious Samurai shows what he can do with a full body!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Samurai Who Can Cut Fire! Foxfire Kin'emon!

programme.title: The Master gathers his young test subjects, shocking secret identities are finally revealed, and the poisonous purple blob continues its march across the island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shocking! The True Identity of the Mystery Man Vergo!

programme.title: Nami and Usopp get an unexpected helping hand in their fight to save the children, Chopper plots a daring escape attempt, and the Master markets his greatest weapon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save the Children! The Master's Evil Hands Close In!

programme.title: A desperate need for candy leads the children to return to the lab, and Caesar plans to show the world the new and improved version of Smiley!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shaking Up the New World! Caesar's Horrendous Experiment!

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of purple gas that turns everything living thing in its path into petrified statues of ash!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadliest Weapon of Mass Destruction in History! Shinokuni!

programme.title: Law's got a trick up his sleeve that could mean the difference between life and death. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, but can they reach safety before being swallowed by a poisonous cloud?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Launching the Counter Attack! Luffy and Laws Great Escape!

programme.title: Finally reunited and returned to their proper bodies, the Straw Hats fall in line as Luffy and Law lead the charge to settle the score with Caesar and save the children!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance's Great Advance

programme.title: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, Chopper races through the compound in search of the drugged children, and Tashigi's men make the ultimate sacrifice!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tashigi's Tears! G-5's Desperate Breakthrough Plan!

programme.title: Luffy races toward Caesar in the hopes of delivering a beating, Sanji saves a damsel in distress, and Chopper tries to prevent the children from eating the drugged candy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Treacherous Vice Admiral! Demon Bamboo Vergo!

programme.title: Sanji and Vergo slug it out in a cloud of toxic gas, Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar's reign of terror to a brutal end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fierce Battle Gets Heated! Luffy vs. Caesar!

programme.title: With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo goes into action in order to protect his criminal operation! Caesar slips away from Luffy leaving him to face off with the frigid Monet, and the rest of the crew face down a menacing dragon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mastermind Underground! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies from Exposure?! The Spine-chilling Snow Woman Monet!

programme.title: Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar's madness!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists Collide! A Battle of the Two Vice Admirals!

programme.title: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Captain Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!

programme.title: It's Zoro vs. Monet in a duel to the death - or is it? Tashigi comes to lend a hand, and she'll need to bring her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness! Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showing Off His Techniques! Zoro's Formidable One-Sword Style!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Robin watch in horror as Mocha makes a heartbreaking sacrifice in a courageous attempt to save the lives of her friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Save Her Friends! Mocha Runs at the Risk of Her Life!

programme.title: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!

programme.title: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!

programme.title: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!

programme.title: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!

programme.title: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!

programme.title: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!

programme.title: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is posing as Lupin and blowing up bridges, causing a lot of damage and injuries. Lupin and Jigen discover that the bomber is trying to force an armored car to travel along a route of his choosing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Baron Ukraine are both after the world's most skilled counterfeiter. Lupin would have no problem beating the Baron, but the Baron has hired a man called Flinch along with Fujiko and gave them instructions to kill Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Mamo Kyosuke claims that Lupin will disappear from the world in four days. He claims that he is a time traveler from 2874 seeking revenge. Apparently, Lupin XIII destroyed the Mamo clan on March 2874.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are both after the legendary Eye of the Nile emerald. It is going to be a wedding gift presented at a wedding being held on a yacht.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Zenigata has been invited to an international police convention in Europe; his chief wants him to go, but Zenigata does not want to since Lupin has declared that he will steal a gold bust within the next three days.
programme.sub-title: Let's Catch Lupin and Go to Europe

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko goads Lupin into stealing a large shipment of diamonds. Lupin takes the task despite Jigen's protest that Fujiko is playing them for fools. Of course, Jigen is right.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko invites Lupin and the gang to a famous nightclub owned by the sexy Hoshikage Rinko. Only Goemon refuses. This was a wise move as Rinko places timebombs on Fujiko, Jigen, and Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Smith is an art thief that is selling stolen paintings under the guise of a beauty contest. Lupin decides he wants in on the action as well, promising to steal away the treasured paintings.
programme.sub-title: Keep an Eye On the Beauty Contest

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Inspector Ganimard III is the grandson of Lupin I's archnemesis. He has come to Japan as the head of security for the 1972 France Fair but also intends to restore his family's honor by arresting Lupin III.
programme.sub-title: Which of the Third Generation Will Win!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone is committing thefts under Lupin's name. Lupin follows the imposters back to their island hideout. He has apparently stumbled into a whole island of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Rie is being held captive though she does not realize it. She believes the man holding her is a friend of her father, Ken Makita. Lupin shows up to rescue her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Gordon, an FBI computer specialist, is in Japan to operate a computer capable of predicting crimes and determining how to stop them. The Metropolitan Police Department hopes that this will finally help them capture Lupin.
programme.sub-title: The First Move Wins Computer Operation!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A disputed horde of recently discovered ancient gold coins draws the attention of Lupin and company. As the ownership of the coins is disputed, Lupin decides to settle the matter on his own by stealing them from the Dai Nippon Bank.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Bye Bye, Lady Liberty
programme.desc: Foiled repeatedly by the predictions of Interpol's supercomputer, professional looter Lupin III has settled down. A sinister secret organization and a young computer genius are thrown into the mix. And whose side is the buxom Fujiko on this time?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: Escape Plan, (2012, Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Years after he fought his way out of prison, Ray Breslin must return to the hell he once escaped from to save his friend from the prisons brutal human battleground, known as Hades.

programme.title: The Running Man, (1987, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A wrongly-convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a TV game show.

programme.title: The Gunfight at Dodge City, (1959, Drama)
programme.desc: Seeking a fresh start, Bat Masterson (Joel McCrea) rolls into Dodge City with a chip on his shoulder and a gun on his hip. But soon, his mysterious past will catch up with him when an old friend calls in a favor...one that might cost him his life!

programme.title: The Unforgiven, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: John Huston directs Audrey Hepburn in this thrilling, romantic western about a woman who becomes the target of lawless racism and brutality when it is discovered that she was born to the Kiowa tribe but secretly adopted by a white frontier family.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Drama)

programme.title: Fort Yuma, (1955, Drama)

programme.title: Canadian Pacific, (1949, Drama)

programme.title: The Iron Sheriff, (1957, Drama)
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden plays a sheriff with continuing moral dilemmas. Should he relate a deathbed confession which falsely implicates his son in a murder? Should he carry out his threat to cold-bloodedly kill the real murderer or bring him to legal justice?

programme.title: Fort Massacre, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Joel McCrea gives a compelling performance as a cavalry sergeant apparently leading his men to safety, but actually slowly going mad in an insane attempt to avenge an Indian massacre.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, (2008, Drama)

programme.title: The Great Raid, (2005, Military & War Action)

programme.title: Show de Vizinha
programme.desc: Um estudante do ensino mdio se apaixona por sua vizinha, e descobre que ela uma atriz porn.

programme.title: Aposta Mxima
programme.desc: Estudante acredita que foi enganado e vai Costa Rica enfrentar magnata.

programme.title: Sr. & Sra. Smith
programme.desc: Um casal entediado fica surpreso ao descobrir que ambos so assassinos contratados por agncias rivais para se matarem.

programme.title: Endiabrado
programme.desc: Um jovem desesperado para mudar de vida faz um acordo com o Diabo.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operao secreta acaba gerando resultados catastrficos.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notrio criminoso chins.

programme.title: Cdigo de Honra
programme.desc: Um ex-coronel das foras especiais se torna um vigilante que mata criminosos, enquanto um ex-colega quer det-lo.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, est imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que procurado por lobisomens por razes desconhecidas.

programme.title: Demolidor - O Homem sem Medo
programme.desc: Um homem cegado por resduos txicos, que tambm ampliaram os seus outros sentidos, luta contra o crime como um super-heri acrobtico das artes marciais.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Linha de Ao
programme.desc: O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenes por trs da investigao encomendada.

programme.title: Olhos Famintos
programme.desc: Um irmo e uma irm dirigindo para casa pelo campo isolado para as frias de primavera encontram uma criatura carnvora no meio de sua farra ritualstica.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tquio e exposta a uma misteriosa maldio sobrenatural: um esprito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vtima.

programme.title: O Grito 2
programme.desc: Com Amber Tamblyn e Arielle Kebbel. Em Tquio, a irm de uma garota previamente morta por uma maldio maligna acidentalmente infligida a si mesma. Com a ajuda de um jornalista, ela deve aprender como impedi-lo de uma vez por todas.

programme.title: O Grito 3
programme.desc: Dr. Sullivan descobre que os fantasmas de Kayako e Toshio tm como alvo uma nova famlia. Se ela falhar em convencer uma misteriosa mulher japonesa a ajudar a banir os espritos vingativos, todos os envolvidos enfrentaro um destino pior do que a morte.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trs dos jogos cruis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polcia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: A Casa Amaldioada
programme.desc: Neste suspense sobrenatural de tirar o flego com as maiores estrela de Hollywood, um estudo sobre o medo vira um pesadelo para um professor e seus trs objetos de estudos presos em uma misteriosa manso.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: Aposta Mxima
programme.desc: Estudante acredita que foi enganado e vai Costa Rica enfrentar magnata.

programme.title: Caado
programme.desc: Aaron Hallam um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vtimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland.

programme.title: Inimigo em Casa
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: Vice
programme.desc: 40 quilos de herona desaparecem aps uma transao secreta malfeita e os policiais na unidade de crime envolvida esto sendo mortos um de cada vez.

programme.title: Hava em Chamas
programme.desc: Quando um supervulco entra em erupo no Hava, uma equipe de especialistas precisa correr contra o tempo para salvar a vida da populao antes que ela seja atingida pela lava fumegante.

programme.title: Vulco - O Apocalipse
programme.desc: Quando um ex-comandante das Operaes Especiais visita Pompia, sua esposa e filha ficam presas no Monte. O Vesvio entra em erupo com fora macia.

programme.title: Equilibrium
programme.desc: Num futuro incerto, a raa humana foi quase totalmente devastada da Terra. Para salvar o mundo, os governantes decidiram criar uma droga capaz de inibir o sentimento humano e garantir a paz para sempre.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: A Evoluo
programme.desc: A saga continua mostrando o incio da antiga disputa entre as duas triboso os Vampiros y Lycans, enquanto a bela herona vampira Selene descobre que foi trada pela sua prpria raa e agora precisa buscar vingana.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite: O Despertar
programme.desc: Selene, que descobre que tem um filha adolescente chamada Lycan, uma hbrida de vampiro e humano. Juntas, elas devem impedir a empresa biotecnolgica Antigen de produzir as criaturas conhecidas como SuperLycans.

programme.title: A Hospedeira
programme.desc: Quando um inimigo invisvel ameaa a humanidade assumindo seus corpos e apagando suas memrias, Melanie Stryder arrisca tudo para proteger as pessoas com quem se importa.

programme.title: Trfico Humano
programme.desc: Traumatizado pela morte de um inocente, Bradley, um assassino de aluguel, se isola da sociedade e vagueia pelas perigosas ruas de um gueto do centro da cidade em busca de sentido para sua vida.

programme.title: Longe de Casa
programme.desc: Um ex-jogador problemtico da Major League Baseball volta para casa para confrontar seu padrasto abusivo.

programme.title: O Liquidador
programme.desc: Um guarda-costas altamente qualificado, vingando a morte de seu irmo, descobre um crculo de corrupo que se estende aos mais altos nveis da sociedade e do governo.

programme.title: Aposta Mxima
programme.desc: Estudante acredita que foi enganado e vai Costa Rica enfrentar magnata.

programme.title: Velocidade sem Limites
programme.desc: Uma bela mulher, lder de uma banda de msica, se v envolvida em uma competio ilegal de corrida de carros realizada para entreter milionrios entediados.

programme.title: Tudo por Justia
programme.desc: Russell, um operrio da fbrica, tenta proteger seu irmo mais novo, Rodney, de todos os perigos. No entanto, quando este desaparece, Russell decide resolver o problema por conta prpria.

programme.title: City Hunter: O Caador de Encrenca
programme.desc: Ryu Saeba, detetive particular, busca a filha fugitiva de um empresrio em um navio cruzeiro sequestrado por bandidos.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro
programme.desc: Um homem, que encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele no sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua famlia.

programme.title: Ip Man - O Mestre do Kung Fu
programme.desc: Durante o tempo em que foi capito da polcia na cidade de Foshan, Ip Man perseguido por um gngster vingativo, enquanto o exrcito japons invade a regio.

programme.title: Massacre no Bairro Chins
programme.desc: Jackie Chan faz o papel de um fugitivo do Japo que se torna um assassino para a mfia. O longa focado na vida de imigrantes chineses que vivem no Japo.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que est tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do pas est em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemtico disfarado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacvel. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se v lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua famlia.

programme.title: Endiabrado
programme.desc: Um jovem desesperado para mudar de vida faz um acordo com o Diabo.

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: Loucas por Amor, Viciadas em Dinheiro
programme.desc: Com Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah e Katie Holmes. Depois que seu marido perde o emprego, uma dona de casa comea a trabalhar limpando a Casa da Moeda e tem uma ideia: chamar suas amigas para roubar notas de dinheiro que seriam destrudas.

programme.title: A Justiceira
programme.desc: Ela uma professora antiquada, que inspira os alunos de uma cidadezinha. Mas eles no sabem que o passatempo favorito dela fazer justia com as prprias mos.

programme.title: Carros Usados, Vendedores Pirados!
programme.desc: Don Ready (Jeremy Piven) e sua louca equipe de negociadores tm apenas um fim de semana para se livrar de mais de 200 carros e provar que, quando se trata de persuaso, conspirao e todo tipo de mau comportamento, eles manjam do negcio!

programme.title: Caindo na Estrada
programme.desc: Quando um vdeo muito picante de Josh (Breckin Meyer) ficando muito louco com a sensual Beth (Amy Smart) enviado acidentalmente para sua namorada, ele tem trs dias para chegar ao Texas antes que a fita chegue!

programme.title: O Foragido
programme.desc: Depois de ser injustamente enquadrado, Ryan Harrison escapa do nibus da priso para provar sua inocncia, tentando encontrar um homem misterioso sem uma perna, um olho e um brao.

programme.title: Amigos, Amigos, Mulheres Parte
programme.desc: Tank (Dane Cook) encara o mais difcil teste de amizade quando seu melhor amigo (Jason Biggs) o contrata para convidar a ex-namorada (Kate Hudson) para um encontro desastroso e, assim, mostrar a ela como ele um timo namorado.

programme.title: Um Sorriso como o Seu
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear interpreta um marido relutante em ter filhos, em uma comdia romntica sobre um casal que tenta conceber um beb.

programme.title: Show de Vizinha
programme.desc: Um estudante do ensino mdio se apaixona por sua vizinha, e descobre que ela uma atriz porn.

programme.title: Sorte no Amor
programme.desc: Ashley, uma mulher sortuda, troca sua sorte pela do Jake, que est na pior.

programme.title: Uma Noiva em Apuros
programme.desc: Karina est fazendo o possvel para ter o primeiro relacionamento feliz em sua vida. Infelizmente, o homem a quem ela deu seu corao parece estar mais interessado em si mesmo do que nela.

programme.title: Recm-Chegada
programme.desc: Uma empresria de Miami, Flrida, se ajusta sua nova vida em uma pequena cidade de Minnesota.

programme.title: Ritmo Quente
programme.desc: De 17 anos, est de frias com sua famlia em um resort nas montanhas, quando ela atrada para os alojamentos dos funcionrios, ouvindo msica. L ela conhece Johnny, o instrutor de dana do hotel, e eles se apaixonam apesar dos avisos de todos.

programme.title: Lar Doce Lar ... Ou no
programme.desc: Victoria Tremont, entediada com a vida, quer encontrar algum especial. Um estranho entra na cafeteria e no responde ao seu charme. Ela descobre que ele dirige um ministrio de moradias e decide se voluntariar, mesmo que precise mentir.

programme.title: Sobrou Pra Voc
programme.desc: Abbie e Robert so amigos com muita coisa em comum: jovens, tm uma viso no-convencional da vida, inteligentes, impulsivos e um terrvel azar no amor. Eles fariam um par perfeito, se no houvesse um problema: Robert gay.

programme.title: A Fora do Destino
programme.desc: O solitrio Zack Mayo (Richard Gere) entra na Escola de Oficiais para se tornar piloto da Marinha e em treze semanas torturantes, ele aprende a importncia da disciplina, do amor e da amizade.

programme.title: No O Tipo Da Cinderela
programme.desc: Indy acha que sua vida est bem at que ela conhece um novo cara que a ajuda a descobrir quem ela e o que ela vale.

programme.title: Amor e Outras Drogas
programme.desc: Maggie e Jamie comeam um relacionamento que os confronta com a doena e a droga do amor.

programme.title: Trfico de Mulheres
programme.desc: Aps serem traficadas atravs de uma elaborada rede global de trfico de pessoas, rgos e drogas, trs meninas acabam em um bordel no Texas como escravas sexuais. Elas juntam suas foras para tentar escapar e reconquistar sua liberdade.

programme.title: Os rapazes esto tristes pois o senhor Hanckey anda bastante ocupado com sua famlia e no consegue compartilhar seu esprito natalino pela cidade. Ento eles tem uma ideia para reviver o esprito natalino na cidade.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo - S1E53

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo - S2E54
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento - S2E55
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro - S2E56
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno - S2E57
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido - S2E58

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo - S2E59

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia - S2E60

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - S2E61
programme.desc: Gaara e seus salvadores retornam Aldeia de Areia. Aps visitar o tmulo de Vov Chiyo, Naruto e os ninjas da Folha tm que partir. Deidara aparece ferido na frente de Zetsu e Tobi. Na Aldeia da Folha, algum tenta infiltrar um garoto na equipe Kakashi!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Companheiro De Equipe! - S2E62

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis - S2E63

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto - S2E64
programme.desc: Naruto fica enfurecido ao saber que Sai o atacou para test-lo. Tsunade, Jiraiya, Yamatoe e Shizune se reunem no quarto de Kakashi. Jiraiya expe o comportamento despreocupado de Naruto. Sai recebe um envelope misterioso do setor operacional da fundao.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Presa Na Escurido - S2E65

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Almas Ressuscitadas - S2E66
programme.desc: Sakura v Sai trabalhando em uma pintura abstrata e encontra um livro de desenhos incomum no meio das coisas dele. Enquanto vo em direo ponte Tenchi, eles se mantm atentos contra qualquer emboscada. Yamato orienta sua equipe caso uma luta acontea.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - S2E67

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Momento De Despertar - S2E68

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Desespero - S2E69

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia - S2E70
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - S2E71

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima - S2E72

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki - S2E73

programme.title: A partida decisiva das finais dos torneios americanos se resume a Max vs. Michael, do 'All Starz', em uma batalha que coloca cincia e tecnologia contra o esprito humano.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E28

programme.title: Depois de derrotar por pouco o All Starz no Torneio Americano, Kenny decide que ele deve registrar um banco de dados dos pontos altos e baixos dos BladeBreakers desde o incio.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E29

programme.title: Viajando de barco pelo Atlntico, os Bladebreakers devem no apenas lidar com o enjoo de Kenny, mas uma revelao devastadora.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E30

programme.title: As crianas so levadas a perder o barco, forando-as a passar a noite em Londres, onde uma misteriosa fita de vdeo do pai de Tyson entregue a eles.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E31

programme.title: Depois que seu trem misteriosamente sequestrado, as crianas se encontram nos recessos escuros de um tnel. aqui que os Bladebreakers encontram um grupo de fantasmas zumbis, os Dark Bladers.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E32

programme.title: Enquanto os Bladebreakers vo para o Campeonato do Mundo na Rssia, eles ficam presos em Paris, onde acabam perdendo um dia procurando Kai que desapareceu misteriosamente.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E33

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers passam um dia extra em Paris e se separam para ver os pontos tursticos. Ray alcana seu tio, Max faz uma farra de compras e Kai procura informaes.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E34

programme.title: Os Bladebreakers chegam a Roma, procurando pelo misterioso Enrique. Zombando do desafio de Beyblade, Enrique decide que prefere passar o dia com algumas de suas amigas.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E35

programme.title: The Last Gunfight (2025)
programme.desc: As the worlds top assassins fight to the death in a ruthless underground tournament, a rogue crew has its own deadly agenda: survive the carnage, outplay the killers and take down the mastermind behind it all.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Cloverfield (2008)
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan (1998)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: A lieutenant colonel and approximately 400 U.S. troops battle 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers in 1965.

programme.title: Becky (2020)
programme.desc: Spunky and rebellious Becky tries to reconnect with her father during a weekend getaway at a lakefront house. But the trip soon takes a turn for the worse when convicts on the run, led by the merciless Dominick, suddenly invade the home.

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool (2024)
programme.desc: A mans life collapses when his mistress is found dead in his pool. Terrified of the consequences and desperate to protect his family, he conceals the truth, triggering a chaotic night that threatens to unravel his perfect life.

programme.title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.sub-title: La Madrina: The Savage Life of Lorine Padilla (2020)
programme.desc: Lorine Padilla joins a street gang in the Bronx, N.Y., before becoming an activist and spiritual adviser.

programme.title: Bitchin: The Sound and Fury of Rick James
programme.desc: A raw and intimate documentary look at the wildly colorful life of legendary funk artist Rick James; original interviews with artists, collaborators and friends.

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.sub-title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass (2021)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Oliver Stone examines the circumstances surrounding the assassination of President John F. Kennedy on Nov. 22, 1963, in Dallas.

programme.title: Chuck (2016)
programme.desc: Liquor salesman and part-time prizefighter Chuck Wepner gets the chance to take on Muhammad Ali in a highly publicized title fight, launching him to sudden fame.

programme.title: Gasoline Alley (2022)
programme.desc: Set in the underbelly of Los Angeles, a man is drawn into a high-profile triple murder. The two police detectives on his tail soon join him in attempting to uncover an explosive conspiracy.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers (2006)
programme.desc: Some of the servicemen who raised the U.S. flag on Mount Suribachi during the Battle of Iwo Jima at the end of World War II live to hear of their status as heroes.

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates (2001)
programme.desc: A Nazi sniper (Ed Harris) travels to Stalingrad to find and kill a Russian sharpshooter (Jude Law), the hero of the propaganda campaign of a political officer (Joseph Fiennes).

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate (2019)
programme.desc: Seasoned warrior Sarah Connor joins forces with a hybrid cyborg human and the T-800 model to protect a young woman from the Rev-9 -- a newly modified and seemingly indestructible liquid Terminator from the future.

programme.title: Joe Dirt (2001)
programme.desc: A goofy janitor (David Spade) tells a radio talk-show host (Dennis Miller) about his search for the parents who abandoned him.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby (2006)
programme.sub-title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby (2006)
programme.desc: NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby faces his greatest challenge ever when French Formula One driver Jean Girard roars onto the scene.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn (2007)
programme.desc: During the Vietnam War, Dieter Dengler (Christian Bale), a U.S. fighter pilot, is shot down over Laos and taken captive by enemy soldiers.

programme.title: Witness (1985)
programme.desc: An eight-year-old Amish boy witnesses a drug-related murder in a Philadelphia train station. The Philadelphia police captain discovers that the murderers are cops trying to squelch a corruption investigation.

programme.title: The Hunted (2003)
programme.desc: Aided by the FBI, a retired combat-trainer (Tommy Lee Jones) searches for a former student (Benicio del Toro) who is killing civilians in Oregon.

programme.title: Shadowland (2021)
programme.desc: An ex-serviceman is forced to seek refuge for his team and the family in their charge in rural Scotland, with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: An examination of a practice in Thailands criminal justice system, where inmates are given the opportunity to earn their freedom through Muay Thai fighting.

programme.title: Chinatown (1974)
programme.desc: A 1930s gumshoe named Jake (Jack Nicholson) sticks his nose into a sordid mess over Los Angeles land and water.

programme.title: Nick of Time (1995)
programme.desc: If a recent widower (Johnny Depp) doesnt kill the governor of California within 90 minutes, a kidnapper (Christopher Walken) will kill his daughter.

programme.title: Judgment Night (1993)
programme.desc: On their way to a boxing match, four young men take a wrong turn in Chicago and find danger as witnesses to murder.

programme.title: The Score (2001)
programme.desc: A master thief (Robert De Niro) agrees to work with a volatile partner (Edward Norton) for one last heist before he retires.

programme.title: The Usual Suspects (1995)
programme.desc: A detective (Chazz Palminteri) questions a con man about his relationships with assorted criminals (Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne) and their link to a ship explosion.

programme.title: Chinatown (1974)
programme.desc: A 1930s gumshoe named Jake (Jack Nicholson) sticks his nose into a sordid mess over Los Angeles land and water.

programme.title: Cujo (1983)
programme.desc: Bitten by a rabid bat, a huge dog traps a Maine woman (Dee Wallace) and her young son (Danny Pintauro) in their Ford Pinto.

programme.title: Good Boy (2022)
programme.desc: Sigrid thinks shes met the perfect match in Christian, but theres one catch: he lives with a man who acts like his pet dog. Trying to be open-minded, she continues the relationship but soon notices an insidious undertone to Christian.

programme.title: Vicious (2025)
programme.desc: A strange ritual soon unravels into a waking nightmare when a woman receives a mysterious box that comes with instructions to place three things inside: something you need, something you hate, and something you love.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: God chooses Noah (Russell Crowe) to build an ark and save the animals and his family from an apocalyptic flood.

programme.title: After Innocence (2005)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Jessica Sanders interviews seven men who were wrongfully imprisoned until DNA testing set them free.

programme.title: The Infernal Machine (2022)
programme.desc: Reclusive and controversial author Bruce Cogburn is drawn out of hiding when he begins to receive endless letters from an obsessive fan. What ensues is a dangerous labyrinth as Bruce searches for the person behind the cryptic messages.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement (2000)
programme.desc: A decorated career Marine (Samuel L. Jackson), about to stand trial for a botched rescue mission, asks an old friend (Tommy Lee Jones) to defend him.

programme.title: Man With No Past (2025)
programme.desc: Waking up in an unfamiliar city, a man with no memory must confront the mysteries of his own identity. However, his desperate search to uncover the past pits him against a powerful enemy, leading to a showdown that ultimately reveals the truth.

programme.title: Semper Fi (2007)
programme.desc: Filmmaker Vince DiPersio documents the experience of Jeff Key, a Marine who served in Iraq while hiding his homosexuality.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker (2002)
programme.desc: The commander (Harrison Ford) of a Russian submarine tries to avert a disaster after a nuclear reactor malfunctions.
